issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink,I noted that a particular type of activity indicator was not being shown on the 3GS, but was displayed on the other test devices.

Here are the tests with the missing indicator:
Base UI>Views>Web Views>Basic Auth
Base UI>Views>Web Views>PDF URL
Base UI>Views>Web Views>Webview controls
 
Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS onto device
2) Navigate to any of the listed tests above
3) Look for the indicator

Result:
No indicator displayed

Expected Result:
Indicator displays

Notes:
OCCURS on 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: iPhone 3GS fails to display activity indicator in some tests
fields.environment: iPhone 3GS (3.1.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106011734, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X rc9515533

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
